itemLabel: Brenda Dean, Baroness Dean of Thornton-le-Fylde

wikipedia_page.main: Brenda Dean, Baroness Dean of Thornton-le-Fylde,  (29 April 1943 – 13 March 2018) was a British trade unionist and Labour Party politician. As general secretary of SOGAT from 1985 until 1991, she was "the first woman elected to head a major industrial trade union."

response: * Brenda Dean, Baroness Dean of Thornton-le-Fylde, trade unionist (left school at 16)
*Brenda Dean, Baroness Dean of Thornton-le-Fylde, 74, British trade unionist and peer.Baroness Dean of Thornton-le-Fylde
